data.name: Super Idol
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1571820/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778330/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/


About the Game

â—†Featured Systems

â—‡Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
â—‡Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

â—†Story

Have you heard of the subtle rules?

Some people believe in the power of the show business, while others rely on their beauty to sell.

I officially inherited my father's studio, which was about to go bankrupt.

In the mixed-up music industry, should I follow the potential rules and use my sister's body as a price to step onto the stage of stardom?

The company's main goal is to provide the best possible service to its customers.

The first thing you need to do is to take your sister to the next level, or to be unknown, and play and sing in the bar for the rest of your life.

How to play

The game is a role-playing simulation game. Players will take on the role of a producer and go through six stages, such as filing, inviting songs, chorus audition, recording, post-production, and releasing, to continuously release records. The goal is to produce high quality records and take your sister to the annual Golden Melody Awards to challenge for the Best New Artist, Best Female Artist, and Best Producer awards. In the third year of the game, you will try to form a band and lead your sister to the top of the singing world by leading your artists or collaborating with other famous artists.

In the process, the player can choose to let his sister rely on her strengths or use his connections to rise to the top. Not only will the sister face the choice, but the player will also face the temptation of potential rules, swinging between the scales of advancement and degradation.

data.short_description: "Super Idol" is a first-person simulation game that tells the story of the music industry's potential rules and ecology. Players take on the role of a music producer and his sister and singer who are dependent on him to break into the music industry.
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, Incest sex, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
